chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21+ 5G product has the above problem:
Device won't turn on.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product,  the 27.05.24. 

The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 

Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 07.06.24 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Sema from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
